text: John Abraham Page (10 February 1893 – 1964) was an English professional footballer who played as a winger for Sunderland. ==References== Category:1893 births Category:1964 deaths Category:Sportspeople from Sunderland, Tyne and Wear Category:Footballers from Tyne and Wear Category:English footballers Category:Association football wingers Category:Sunderland West End F.C. players Category:Sunderland A.F.C. players Category:English Football League players Category:Date of death missing
title: Jack Page (footballer, born 1893)
